title.narrative: Evidence-based policies for the sustainable use of energy resources in the Asia-Pacific Region

description.narrative: The project “Fiji: energy and transport data for electrification of the transport sector and electric vehicle power sector infrastructure requirements analysis” will be on electrifying Fiji's transport sector in particular the land transport sector and the infrastructure requirements for the transition to electric vehicles into Viti Levu Island which contains 80% of Fiji's total population. The project is co-funded with UNESCAP within the Ministry of Infrastructure and Transport (MoIT) providing guidance and advisory support on the execution of the project.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP)

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04523 Republic of Korea

To be assessed on a 5-point scale balanced scorecard with a maximum score of 10.
